item.title: Board Meetings
item.description: Board Meetings 2021 Board meetings are currently held on the second Tuesday of each month at 7:30 PM in the warm room at the Pittsburgh Curling Club: 491 McCoy Road McKees Rocks, PA 15136 Google Map All members are welcome and encouraged to attend! We hope to see you there!
